description: This service provides advanced insights into the digital footprint of an individual based on their phone number, email, and name. It includes a digital identity score, footprint level, and detailed first-seen and last-seen metrics for various combinations of these identifiers.
llm_summary: Digital Footprint Advanced service analyzes the digital presence of an individual using their phone number, email, and name. It provides a digital identity score, footprint level, and detailed first-seen and last-seen metrics for alternate data verification and compliance workflows.
use_cases: Assess the digital presence of an individual during onboarding workflows.
Retrieve advanced metrics for compliance and fraud prevention.
Support alternate data-based KYC processes in financial services and insurance.
Enable identity verification workflows in government and private sectors.

request_schema.description: Mobile number to analyze digital footprint.
Email address to analyze digital footprint.
Name of the individual to analyze digital footprint.
User consent for accessing digital footprint data

response_schema.description: Overall status of the API response
Unique request ID generated by the API
HTTP status code for the service

digitalIdentityScore.description: Digital identity score of the individual

phoneFirstSeenDays.description: Days since the phone number was first seen

emailFirstSeenDays.description: Days since the email address was first seen

phoneEmailFirstSeenDays.description: Days since the phone number and email combination was first seen

phoneEmailLastSeenDays.description: Days since the phone number and email combination was last seen

phoneNameFirstSeenDays.description: Days since the phone number and name combination was first seen

phoneNameLastDaysYear.description: Days since the phone number and name combination was last seen

emailNameFirstSeenDays.description: Days since the email address and name combination was first seen

emailNameLastSeenDays.description: Days since the email address and name combination was last seen
